title: Structured Discovery-Based Addition Rule Learning Project for [Large-Scale] Education

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary arithmetic operations and number system concepts
context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening mathematical foundations for scientific problem-solving. Provides a self-directed inquiry learning environment utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the n+1 and 1+n addition rules with 90% accuracy through structured discovery activities.
Learners can present at least three examples of transfer applications of addition rules through project deliverables.
Learners can reflect on the scientific applicability of addition rule learning with over 80% satisfaction through peer assessment in a PBL environment.

resources: Collaborative whiteboard app for group learning

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
